name: Impossible Sun
description:
Your ship is crashing into an exploding sun. Fight off the inevitable by picking up fuel canisters and avoiding solar flares!

This game was a student project made at Falmouth University in a couple of days in October 2019.

Credits

Design + Programming: Robbie Wastell

Programming: Ethan Jones, Adrian Tofan

Music: Jamie Carnell

Ship model: Toby Hurd
